subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ken Griffey Jr. hit his 569th career homer yesterday, a two-run shot that tied him for ninth place on the career list and helped the Cincinnati Reds get a breakthrough 9-5 victory against the visiting Houston Astros.
snippet: Ken Griffey Jr. hit his 569th career homer yesterday, a two-run shot that tied him for ninth place on the career list and helped the Cincinnati Reds get a breakthrough 9-5 victory against the visiting Houston Astros.
